title: I feel terrible for Uzi... :(
body: That poor guy has worked his ass off to get all the way to the finals TWICE. This time with a language barrier which is incredible in its own right. He hasn't gotten to touch that cup even once. I hope he gets to hold it once behind the scenes, because my god, that guy has EARNED it.

I really do feel bad for Uzi, and it was more than acknowledged that  he carries his team. He is often the only reason they win. They have to build their entire comp around him. It's more of a game of hey let's not lose our lanes too badly and hope Uzi can pick up our slack. I feel bad for Uzi because he is on a completely higher level than the team he played with. 

The 2 best people on Royal Club were "Uzi & Insec" 

Every ban phase Insec and Uzi were shutdown from getting their usual champions. Mostly Insec was shut down which led to him being forced to play on champions he isn't as strong on- Ex mediocre Rammus/ Panth performance.

I think if there is anything to take away from this is:

Insec needs to expand his champion pool. Without his lee sin/ or rengar he is an easy jungler to deal with. Samsung White just shut Insec down before they started each game with banning his comfortable champions.  He needs to find more champions he can bring that legendary level of play on. If he does that his opponents can't bank of bans to keep him down. And I am sure he will bring some real threats to the competition 

And honestly I wish Uzi all the best and luck in the world but really hope he finds a team that is more on his level of play. 

This may be a dramatic example but when I watch Uzi's games they strike me as a challenger ranked ADC being put on a mid gold level team, and thrown up against all diamonds. You may be individually amazing and better skilled than both teams, however you can only do so much to carry your team when they are so obviously mismatched. This wasn't a case of Uzi not performing well, it was a case of every member of his team lost, and there isn't a way to easily rise above that and carry against that type of situation.

Wish you the best Uzi, & Insec hope to see you pull a world win next year

but for now

Congrats SSW
